name: RUNOVER
description:
made for the mix and game jam 2020, combining stealth and racing.

  • a two player game about robbing graves and running people over.
  •  random hat event 

---------------------------------------------------------------

first player takes the role of the grave-robber and has to rob 5 graves to win!

arrow keys + space

the second player has to run the first player over to win!

wasd

-------------------------------------------------------------
